description: Commands to manage databricks workspace private endpoint connections.

commands.name: az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection create
commands.summary: Create the status of a private endpoint connection with the specified name.
commands.syntax:
az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection create --name
                                                           --resource-group
                                                           --status {Approved, Disconnected, Pending, Rejected}
                                                           --workspace-name
                                                           [--actions-required]
                                                           [--description]
                                                           [--group-ids]
                                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection delete
commands.summary: Delete private endpoint connection with the specified name.
commands.syntax:
az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection delete [--ids]
                                                           [--name]
                                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                           [--resource-group]
                                                           [--subscription]
                                                           [--workspace-name]

commands.name: az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection list
commands.summary: List private endpoint connections of the workspace.

commands.name: az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection show
commands.summary: Get a private endpoint connection properties for a workspace.

commands.name: az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection update
commands.summary: Update the status of a private endpoint connection with the specified name.
commands.syntax:
az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection update [--actions-required]
                                                           [--add]
                                                           [--description]
                                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                           [--group-ids]
                                                           [--ids]
                                                           [--name]
                                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                           [--remove]
                                                           [--resource-group]
                                                           [--set]
                                                           [--status {Approved, Disconnected, Pending, Rejected}]
                                                           [--subscription]
                                                           [--workspace-name]

commands.name: az databricks workspace private-endpoint-connection wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
